section1.title: Discover a New Experience with Neomi.
section1.description: Savor an unforgettable getaway with all the comforts of home. From mountain peaks to sandy shores, we're with you every step of the way.

section2.title: Neomi Top-Quality Trips, Memorable Moments
section2.description: Experience exclusive tours with expert guides and premium facilities — where every journey is filled with comfort and lasting impressions.

section3.title: Our Services
section3.description: We're committed to providing the best services to support your comfort and ease throughout your journey. Travel safely, comfortably, and memorably with Neomi Tour and Travel

tour.title: Reliable Tour Transport
tour.desc: Enjoy your journey with our well-maintained vehicles and experienced drivers who ensure a smooth and secure ride.

homestay.title: Homestay
homestay.desc: Stay in our well-located homestays, offering the comfort you need just minutes away from top destinations. Ideal for families, couples, or solo adventurers.

hotdesk.title: Tour Packages
hotdesk.desc: We offer comprehensive tour packages designed for your comfort and convenience. From clean and cozy accommodations in strategic locations to enjoyable trips to various tourist attractions. Perfect for families, couples, and solo travelers.

coworking.title: Custom Tour Packages
coworking.desc: Got your own destination? We're ready to create a travel package tailored to your wishes. More flexible and personalized.

section4.title: Popular Destinations
section4.description: Explore our most sought-after travel destinations

section5.title: What Our Customers Say
section5.description: Read testimonials from our satisfied customers

section6.title: Latest Posts
section6.description: Stay updated with our latest travel tips and stories

posts.title: 5 Must-Try Bakso Spots in Malang
posts.excerpt: Malang is known as a culinary city in East Java, and one of the most popular dishes is Malang meatballs.

posts.title: Hidden Beaches to Explore in Malang
posts.excerpt: Discover the beauty of Malang's hidden beaches that are still rarely visited by tourists.

posts.title: Exciting Hike to Mount Bromo
posts.excerpt: Experience hiking Mount Bromo and enjoy the breathtaking sunrise view.

posts.title: Best Night Culinary in Malang
posts.excerpt: Explore the best night culinary spots you must try when visiting Malang.

Footer.description: Enjoy an unforgettable holiday experience with comfort like home. From mountains to beaches, we are ready to accompany every step of your journey.

section1.title: About Us
section1.description: We are passionate about creating unforgettable travel experiences for our clients.

about.title: About Neomi
about.description: At Neomi Tour and Travel, we believe that every journey should be memorable, comfortable, and uniquely tailored to your needs. Founded with the passion to explore and connect, we offer exclusive tour packages and personalized travel experiences that go beyond ordinary vacations. Our dedicated team is committed to crafting unforgettable adventures that suit your preferences, whether you seek relaxation, cultural immersion, or thrilling exploration. We prioritize exceptional service, attention to detail, and local expertise to ensure your trip is seamless from start to finish.With Neomi Tour and Travel, you're not just a traveler — you're a valued guest. We take pride in providing a warm, welcoming atmosphere that makes you feel at home, no matter where your journey takes you.

team1.name: Our Mission
team1.description: To provide exceptional travel experiences that inspire and connect people with the world around them. We aim to create memorable journeys that enrich lives through exploration and discovery.

section3.title: Our Team
section3.description: Meet the passionate individuals behind our success

member1.name: Sarah Johnson
member1.description: With over 15 years of experience in the travel industry, Sarah leads our team with passion and expertise.

member2.name: Michael Chen
member2.description: Michael's deep knowledge of global destinations helps create perfect itineraries for our clients.

member3.name: Emma Wilson
member3.description: Emma ensures every client receives exceptional service and memorable experiences.

section4.title: Our Values
section4.description: The principles that guide everything we do

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in every aspect of our service

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We conduct our business with honesty and transparency

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously seek new ways to enhance travel experiences

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We are committed to responsible and sustainable tourism
